name: asoy
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool us_presidential_election.
Tool description: API for US Presidential Election results, by state (from 1976-) and county (eventually, from 2000-)
API description: Returns JSON block of results for All States, One Year (ASOY), for the specified US Presidential Election year (i.e., 2008).

year.description: The election year to retrieve results for (e.g., 2008).
